name: Junkyard Gardens
description:
Junkyard Gardens is a vertical slice of a larger concept for a game designed around the classic farmsim with a twist.

You make everything yourself, in a distant future you're a robot taking residence in a small area where junk turns into new parts.

Use these parts to craft yourself some friends, and make farm life easier.

ReadMe.txt contains known bugs and credits, please check it out for more info!
